skills.description: 自身の移動速度を20％上昇させ、周囲に攻撃判定のある竜巻を約15秒間展開するスペシャルスキル。
前方に突進しつつ、攻撃力の約2倍で斬りつけるスキル。相手が被ダメージ減少バフ（シールド）を使用していた場合は、威力が飛躍的に向上し、バフを解除することができる。
HPが50%以下になると、ダッシュゲージの回復量が50%上昇するアビリティ。
Quick with Charge ATK Disc, slow with TRAP and HEAL Disc
Regenerate 20% of HP for all allies every 1 second (10 seconds)
Quickly moves backwards from recoil while dealing small paralysis damage to one enemy in front
Damage taken reduced by 40% when HEAL type Disc Skill is used (3 seconds)
Quick with ATK(Charge) Disc, slow with TRAP and HEAL Disc
Whips up a giant tornado to draw in opponents & slams them down, dealing large damage
Jumps forward & delivers a slam ranged attack. Inflicts medium damage to nearby opponents
Damage afflicted by attacking enemy reduced by 40% (2 seconds)
Quick with Spherical AoE ATK and TRAP discs, but slow with Long-range ATK Discs
Creates a cage that detains the whole opponent team, blocks any of their attacks (5 seconds)
Restrains enemy & deals small continuous damage while player is still (3 seconds)
Movement speed increases by 20% while locked on to opponents
Quick with MOVE Discs, but slow with close range and charge ATK Discs
Deploys a barrier which cuts damage to all allies by 100% (5 seconds)
Builds a barrier that blocks long-range attacks by opponents in front (6 seconds)
On death, deploys a one-time barrier that blocks any damage to all teammates
Quick with close range ATK, BUFF, and MOVE Discs, but slow with WARP Discs
Generates a gravity field across the map, stopping the opponent team from flying (7 seconds)
Punches nearby opponent, dealing small damage and knocking them away
If HP falls below 30%, HP recovers 3% every 2 seconds
Quick with charge ATK and BUFF Discs, but slow with MOVE Discs
Increases movement speed by 30% & attack speed by 30% for all allies (12 seconds)
Deals small damage to one enemy in front and reduces movement speed temporarily (5 seconds)
Attack increases by 30% when HP falls below 50%
Quick with BUFF Discs, but slow with spherical AoE and charge ATK Discs
Disguises battle & map information for the opposing team (12 seconds)
Disappear from mini map and field and become untargetable (6 seconds)
On death, sets a massive damage bomb trap that knocks away nearby opponents (2 seconds)
Quick with WARP Discs, but slow with BUFF Discs
An arcane infinite-style attack that delivers a single devastating frontal blow
Creates a substitute on the spot and warps forward (4 seconds)
Perform Perfect Evade to remove cooldown for 'Art of Illusion'
Quick with Spherical AoE ATK Discs, but slow with Charge ATK Discs
Deploys drone that emits smoke screen for all allies, making them untargetable (15 seconds)
Deploys drone that on contact with an enemy, suppressing skills (10 seconds)
Effect duration of TRAP type Disc Skills increases by 2.5% with each use (up to 50%)
Quick with TRAP Discs, but slow with close range ATK Discs
Launches 12 small damage guided missiles forward
Dashes forward a short distance from recoil while dealing small damage to an enemy behind
Dealt damage increases 15% each time you take an opponent out, but resets when you are killed
Quick with Long-range ATK Discs, but slow with HEAL Discs
Temporary automatic high-speed movement with x3 attack speed increase (10 seconds)
Nunchaku deals damage to one enemy in front and forcibly draws them to you
Normal attack increases by 10% each timeone hits (1 seconds, max 50%)
Quick with close range ATK Discs, but slow with TRAP Discs
